name: Iron Crown
flavorText: It resembles a mysterious object introduced in a paranormal magazine as a cutting-edge weapon shaped like a Cobalion.

previous.name: Iron Boulder
previous.flavorText: It resembles a Pokémon described in a dubious magazine as a Terrakion that had been modified by an evil organization.

next.name: Terapagos
next.flavorText: Terapagos protects itself using its power to transform energy into hard crystals. This Pokémon is the source of the Terastal phenomenon.
